mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_nm AS categoryNm, level FROM category WHERE CONNECT_BY_ROOT category_nm = (SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT category_nm as root FROM category WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} START WITH category_pr_id = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR category_id = category_pr_id) AND status = 'N' START WITH category_pr_id = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR category_id = category_pr_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY category_nm
